heading: English language. Study and teaching.
general-note: Here are entered general works, as well as those dealing with the study of the language by native English speakers or the teaching of the language to such speakers. Works on the study of the language by persons with other linguistic backgrounds or the teaching of the language to such persons are entered under this heading further subdivided by the subdivision. Foreign speakers,. or, if limited to persons with a specific linguistic background, by the subdivisions. French speakers, Spanish speakers,. etc. Works on the study and teaching of the English language in specific places, including areas with various native languages, are entered under this heading with local subdivision..
